formElement.documentation: User ID of the job owner whose jobs are being queried; the default is the z/OS user ID. Folded to uppercase; cannot exceed eight characters.
formElement.label: Owner:

formElement.documentation: Job name prefix; defaults is *. Folded to uppercase; cannot exceed eight characters.
formElement.label: Prefix:

formElement.documentation: JobidJob ID. Folded to uppercase; cannot exceed eight characters. This query parameter is mutually exclusive with user-correlator.
formElement.label: Jobid:

formElement.documentation: Maximum number of jobs returned. The value must be between 1 and 1000, inclusive. If this parameter is not specified, or is specified incorrectly, the default value of 1000 is used.
formElement.label: Max-jobs:

formElement.htmlDocumentation:
The user portion of the job correlator. This value is 1 - 32 characters in length, where the first character must be uppercase alphabetic (A-Z) or special ($, #, @). The remaining characters (up to 31) can be any combination of uppercase alphabetic, numeric (0-9), or special. Blank characters are not supported.
This query parameter is mutually exclusive with jobid.

This value is processed by the JES2 subsystem only; the JES3 subsystem does not process the correlator and, instead, indicates zero job matches. For a system with JES3 as the primary subsystem, and one or more JES2 secondary subsystems, the primary JES3 subsystem does not process the correlator, however, the JES2 secondary subsystems can process the correlator.
.
formElement.label: User-correlator:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Property sheet name for results:
